Author: crumb#2550
Content: key to understanding official inflation statistics, is that they constantly adjust the methodology. to have it "fair and accurately taking account the changes happening in economy"

Author: crumb#2550
Content: they don't need to *fiddle* the numbers, the numbers are not 1:1 comparable due to changes in methodology

Author: crumb#2550
Content: i looked into it a few years ago. very eye opening experience

Author: crumb#2550
Content: although in some cases they will fiddle with numbers if changes get too out of hand and cannot be *saved* by methodology changes

Author: crumb#2550
Content: africa, latin america more prone to go that way

Author: Alright#0419
Content: People don't seem to understand how difficult it can be to get a CC into production. You typically need a team of people to test it on testnets prior to throwing it into production otherwise you will be hard forking the chain until it's 100% stable. We provide both the testnet and team of people

Author: Alright#0419
Content: an incentivized testnet for all asset chains, but not limited to just testing as the CCs can stick around after testing phase

Author: Alright#0419
Content: Also the first coin to use KMD's momom scaling tech. We'll do a stress test to demonstrate some dick swingingly large tx/sec number in production at some point 😂
